productDescription:
The Hammered stacking rings are minimalistic looking handmade 14K golden rings.
The hammered structure gives this ring a tough yet elegant look. Stack this ring up with some other golden rings or wear it individually.

optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
